title: Vyre

properties.name: description
properties.value: Vyres are citizens of Darkmeyer that can be talked to as well as pickpocketed from with level 82 Thieving. A successful pickpocket yields coins or other items and 306.9 Thieving experience.

content:
This article is about the citizens of Darkmeyer. For other uses, see Vyrewatch.
 This article has a money making guide: Pickpocketing vyres.
Please add tips to the subpage, rather than the article below.

Vyres are citizens of Darkmeyer that can be talked to as well as pickpocketed from with level 82 Thieving. A successful pickpocket yields coins or other items and 306.9 Thieving experience.

Although the rogue equipment can be used to double the rewards from pickpocketing, nearby Vyrewatch Sentinels are hostile to anyone not wearing a full set of vyre noble clothing and the bank cannot be used without it. Players may opt to only wear the rogue gloves and rogue mask as they occupy different equipment slots or use the full rogue equipment set when there are no sentinels near; for the latter strategy, there are many vyres who can be trapped in their houses. Noctillion Lugosi can be trapped inside the bank. Vallessia von Pitt can be trapped in a house with Jug of wine spawn while also being relatively close to a bank chest.

Contents

  • 1 List of vyres
  • 2 Pickpocketing
    • 2.1 Pickpocket chance
    • 2.2 Pickpocketing info
    • 2.3 Loot
  • 3 Changes
  • 4 References

List of vyres[edit | edit source]

Vyres that can be pickpocketed include:

  • Middle tier:
    • Caninelle Draynar
    • Carnivus Belamorta
    • Diphylla Bechstein
    • Draconis Sanguine
    • Lasenna Rasputin
    • Mort Nightshade
    • Mortina Daubenton
    • Pipistrelle Draynar
    • Remus Kaninus
    • Valentin Rasputin
    • Vallessia Dracyula
    • Vallessia von Pitt
    • Vampyressa van Von
    • Vampyrus Diaemus
    • Violetta Sanguine
    • Vlad Bechstein
    • Vlad Diaemus
    • Vonnetta Varnis
  • The Crypt:
    • Crimsonette van Marr
    • Grigor Rasputin
    • Vormar Vakan
  • Upper tier:
    • Alek Constantine
    • Episcula Helsing
    • Haemas Lamescus
    • Misdrievus Shadum
    • Nakasa Jovkai
    • Natalidae Shadum
    • Noctillion Lugosi
    • Valentina Diaemus
    • Von van Von

Pickpocketing[edit | edit source]

Pickpocket chance[edit | edit source]

The chance of a successful pickpocket without boosts is 42% at level 85 and 50.196% at level 99.[1] This increases by 10% if the Thieving cape is worn and by another 10% with the completion of the hard Ardougne Diary, making the highest possible success rate 60.7%. A successful pickpocket yields coins or other items and 306.9 Thieving experience.

Pickpocketing info[edit | edit source]

Vyre
Level required 82
Thieving XP306.9 xp
TypePickpocket
ToolNone

Loot[edit | edit source]

Drop rates estimated based on 4,080,000 pickpockets from the Drop Rate Project, unless otherwise cited.

A successful pickpocket attempt will gain the following loot:

Item Quantity Rarity Price High Alch
Coins250–315109/132250–315250–315
Death rune28/132372216
Blood rune42/1321,444960
Blood pint16/132870
Uncut ruby15/1321,25660
Diamond11/1321,8381,200
Cooked mystery meat11/1322720
Blood shard11/5,000[2]8,849,7510

Each successful pickpocket is worth: 2,114.77, or 4,229.54 with the full rogue's outfit.

Excluding the Blood shard: 344.82, or 689.64 with the full rogue's outfit.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
18 June 2020
(update)

The chance to succeed while pickpocketing vyres has been improved from ~40% at 99 Thieving to 50.196%.

  2. ^ Jagex. Mod Husky's Twitter account. 26 February 2021. (Archived from the original on 26 February 2021.) Mod Husky: "The rates for the blood shard are 1/5k from pickpocketing and 1/1.5k from killing Vyres which I believe is what the wiki already have, seems the crowd sourcing for droprates got it spot on!"

'''Vyres''' are citizens of [[Darkmeyer]] that can be talked to as well as pickpocketed from with level 82 Thieving. A successful pickpocket yields coins or other items and 306.9 Thieving experience.

Although the [[rogue equipment]] can be used to double the rewards from pickpocketing, nearby [[Vyrewatch Sentinel]]s are hostile to anyone not wearing a full set of [[vyre noble clothing]] and the bank cannot be used without it. Players may opt to only wear the [[rogue gloves]] and [[rogue mask]] as they occupy different equipment slots or use the full rogue equipment set when there are no sentinels near; for the latter strategy, there are many vyres who can be trapped in their houses. [[Noctillion Lugosi]] can be trapped inside the bank. [[Vallessia von Pitt]] can be trapped in a house with [[Jug of wine]] spawn while also being relatively close to a bank chest.

==List of vyres==
Vyres that can be pickpocketed include:

==Pickpocketing==
===Pickpocket chance===
The chance of a successful pickpocket without boosts is 42% at level 85 and 50.196% at level 99.{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Husky|url=https://twitter.com/JagexHusky/status/1273565053296484352|date=18 June 2020|archiveurl=https://archive.vn/0zMvf|archivedate=18 June 2020|quote=The base chance [for vyres] appears to be a 3.137% chance at level 1 and a 50.196% chance at level 99 (i.e. before modifications from any items/diarys)}} This increases by 10% if the [[Thieving cape]] is worn and by another 10% with the completion of the [[hard Ardougne Diary]], making the highest possible success rate 60.7%. A successful pickpocket yields [[coins]] or other items and 306.9 [[Thieving]] experience.
